question: How does the variant ERBB2 L755S affect response to Capecitabine in Triple-receptor Negative Breast Cancer?
cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'ERBB2 L755S'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Capecitabine')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Capecitabine'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Capecitabine')
)
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Triple-receptor Negative Breast')
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'IDH1 R132C OR IDH1 R132H OR IDH1 R132L OR IDH1 R132G OR IDH1 R132S'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Vorasidenib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Vorasidenib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Vorasidenib')
)
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Low Grade Glioma')
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

placeholders.variant_name: IDH1 R132C OR IDH1 R132H OR IDH1 R132L OR IDH1 R132G OR IDH1 R132S

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'HRAS G13D'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor')
)
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Colorectal')
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'YES1 Overexpression OR YES1 Amplification'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Dasatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Dasatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Dasatinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Lung Small Cell Carcinoma')
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'CDK6 Overexpression'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Fulvestrant')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Fulvestrant'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Fulvestrant')
)
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Estrogen-receptor Positive Breast')
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100
